unnormalised: Namaste, folks! Seems like our monthly budget dance is getting trickier. Your friendly neighborhood Energy & Utilities update is here, and it ain't pretty.
normalised: Namaste, folks! Seems like our monthly budget dance is getting trickier. Your friendly neighborhood Energy and Utilities update is here, and it ain't pretty.

unnormalised: LPG cylinder prices have been hiked again, sources say. Industry experts are pointing fingers at global market fluctuations, but all we know is that our aloo parathas are getting more expensive.
normalised: L P G cylinder prices have been hiked again, sources say. Industry experts are pointing fingers at global market fluctuations, but all we know is that our aloo parathas are getting more expensive.

unnormalised: In Delhi, the price of a 14.2 kg domestic cylinder is now reportedly touching Rs. 1150. Ouch! That's a hefty jump, especially for families in smaller 500 sq ft apartments in Mumbai.
normalised: In Delhi, the price of a fourteen point two kilogram domestic cylinder is now reportedly touching rupee one thousand one hundred and fifty. Ouch! That's a hefty jump, especially for families in smaller five hundred square feet apartments in Mumbai.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from the Indian Oil Corporation says they are doing their best to cushion the blow, but admitted to a difficult global landscape. Remember the good old days when a cylinder cost just a few hundred Rs.? Sigh.
normalised: Doctor Sharma from the Indian Oil Corporation says they are doing their best to cushion the blow, but admitted to a difficult global landscape. Remember the good old days when a cylinder cost just a few hundred rupees? Sigh.

unnormalised: The subsidy scheme, many say, needs a serious look. Folks in Lucknow are already talking about going back to cooking on chulhas! Kidding (mostly).
normalised: The subsidy scheme, many say, needs a serious look. Folks in Lucknow are already talking about going back to cooking on chulhas! Kidding (mostly).

unnormalised: Keep an eye out for potential changes in pricing structure next month. Until then, maybe time to brush up on your microwaving skills. Jai Hind!
normalised: Keep an eye out for potential changes in pricing structure next month. Until then, maybe time to brush up on your microwaving skills. Jai Hind!
